issue.title: Objects colliding only with mesh edges.

content.raw:
So the video didn't end up being very visual but at [second 30](https://vimeo.com/120495899#t=0m30s) you can see the middle spheres' contacts switching between the two edges before falling out, similarly at [second 50](https://vimeo.com/120495899#t=0m50s) for the left sphere. 

It's interesting that the forces are still perpendicular to the plane even though it collides from an angle with the edge.
content.html:
So the video didn't end up being very visual but at second 30 you can see the middle spheres' contacts switching between the two edges before falling out, similarly at second 50 for the left sphere.

It's interesting that the forces are still perpendicular to the plane even though it collides from an angle with the edge.
